name: Spare The Animals Fabric
description:
Spare The Animals
You don't want to kill animals? Then this mod is right for you.
This mod makes zombies drop leather, skeletons drop feathers.

Based on Spare The Animals by Miraisoft and adapted for the Fabric Loader:

 - https://github.com/miraisoft-de/mc-forge-sparetheanimals
- https://www.miraisoft.de/mc-forge-sparetheanimals/
